name: Red Knight
description:
Inspired by Divinity Original Sin 2, an amazing RPG with a great Turn-Based Combat, World and Story. While I was playing this game, I wondered what the game would be like with a Real-Time Combat. So, I have created a Game Design Document and Playable Prototype, for a real-time top down combat. 

Note: I have now made my life a bit easier, and created my own (better) design templates, so the structure of these design docs are from my younger, less experienced self. But I will probably redo them.
